title: Science Field Experiential Learning-Based Intentional Practice (SPARRING) Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A science competency enhancement program for working professionals optimized for smartphone-based access.

learning_goals: Can accurately apply over 80% of the SPARRING model’s 8-step deliberate practice procedures to solve real scientific problems
Can enhance the completeness of scientific inquiry projects three or more times through peer feedback and iterative improvements
Utilize tools integrated with LMS in mobile environments to complete science experiment simulations and data analysis tasks at 100%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
